mapper.select: select ibi.subject_id, ibi.currency_name, any_value(ibi.subject_number) subject_number, sum(ibi.debit_amount) debit_amount, sum(ibi.credit_amount) credit_amount, sum(ibi.local_debit_amount) local_debit_amount, sum(ibi.local_credit_amount) local_credit_amount from initial_balance_item ibi where ibi.initial_balance_id = #{initialBalanceId} group by ibi.subject_id, ibi.currency_name
